message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,400,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am only able to offer $1,350,000. This is the most I can afford while staying within my budget.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still aiming for a slightly higher price.  How about $1,375,000? This would be a fair compromise that allows us both to get a good deal.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, I am willing to pay up to $1,360,000 for your product. I hope we can come to an agreement.
